name: Zoulkin Rebellion
description:
Get all the way to the end, with this games unique movement mechanic. You have three movement abilities: Dash, Jump and Move. To use these abilities put dice (with randomly generated numbers) into the ability slot.  Each ability has its own use case with ups and downs.

The Move ability can only be used when on ground but moves the player the full amount written on the dice. 

The Jump ability allows the player to move vertically but doesn't work if the dice used has too low of a number. 

Lastly the Dash ability can be used whenever you want on the ground and in the air but moves the player half the amount written on the dice (rounded down).

I hope you can get to the end. Have fun :)

This game was made in 50 hours for the GMTK game jam 2022 the vast majority of assets used were made in during the jam.
